title: Sidewall - Sample, 1955
creditline: Gift of Katzenbach and Warren, Inc.
description: Four samples removed from the "Greenbrook II Collection". a) Basque - All-over pattern of dark blue pin dots forming vertical rows.These dots are enframed by a light blue background forming a fish-scale pattern. Printed on medium blue ground; b) Christmas Rose: all-over pattern of medium size flowers alternating with small flowers. Very stylized. Printed in two shades of blue and black on a white ground; c) Genevieve: very delicate pattern inspired by Indian chintz design. All-over vining floral design. Printed in two shades of green, blue and lavendar on white ground; d) Innocence: Grid pattern containing letters of the alphabet alternating with pictorial symbols and words. Printed in green, blue pink and off-white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall - Sample, 1955.
1955. Machine-printed. Gift of Katzenbach and Warren, Inc.. 1956-108-2-a/d.
